strings.alert.UK0503: Allowed languages are English, Welsh, Gaelic (Irish), Gaelic (Scottish), Cornish, Ulster Scots
strings.UK0516.alert.individual: Do not identify a point of contact with an individual name, as this is subject to change without warning.
strings.UK0516.alert.distributor: For dataset and dataset series at least a Distributor should be given.
strings.UK0516.alert.city: (Recommended but not mandatory) City found. It is recommended to set the full formal postal address in the "delivery point" field.
strings.UK0516.alert.administrativeArea: (Recommended but not mandatory) Administrative area found. It is recommended to set the full formal postal address in the "delivery point" field.
strings.UK0516.alert.postalCode: (Recommended but not mandatory) Postal code found. It is recommended to set the full formal postal address in the "delivery point" field.
strings.UK0516.alert.country: (Recommended but not mandatory) Country found. It is recommended to set the full formal postal address in the "delivery point" field.
strings.alert.UK0601: Allowed languages are English, Welsh, Gaelic (Irish), Gaelic (Scottish), Cornish, Ulster Scots
strings.UK999.alert.name: Metadata standard name is wrong
strings.UK999.report.name: Metadata standard name:
